General_Description: '''Backstage Pass''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Head to the [[Theater of Dionysos|theater]] in [[Athens]]. With the right connections, I always get to watch the play from backstage. Find me on an actor's mask.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
